You mentioned wanting to watch something else by Robert Wise, and one of his most notable works is "The Deer Hunter" (1978). This film follows a group of friends from a small town in Pennsylvania who are impacted by the Vietnam War. With an all-star cast including Christopher Walken, Robert De Niro, and Meryl Streep, this movie is sure to provide a thought-provoking and emotionally charged experience.

Another recommendation could be "Tell No One" (2001), which also features a talented cast including Marie-Josée Croze and François Cluzet. This thriller follows a doctor who becomes embroiled in a mystery involving his wife's murder, and it promises to be a gripping and suspenseful ride.
